definition: to have the impertinence/to have the cheek to
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed

sentences.english: They even committed such crimes in broad daylight.
sentences.chinese: 他们竟敢在光天化日之下犯这种罪行。

sentences.english: How dare you run off like that?
She had dared to cast a slur on his character.
sentences.chinese: 她竟敢对他的人品加以诋毁。

sentences.english: How dare you! You touch any of my things and you're dead meat!
sentences.chinese: 你真大胆，竟敢东我的东西，你死定了。

sentences.english: He is such a big thing three dare to liu in charge.
sentences.chinese: 他气的是这么大的事刘三竟敢私自作主。

sentences.english: Kate could hardly believe that he would dare come on to her like that.
sentences.chinese: 凯特几乎不能相信他竟敢对她进行调戏。

sentences.english: How dare anybody treat her like this, she thought, tying her up like a chicken .
sentences.chinese: 什么人竟敢这样对待她，把她像鸡一样的捆着。

sentences.english: You must be very brave to mention his name, or very foolish.
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢提他的名字，一定很勇敢，不然就是很蠢。

sentences.english: Do you give me the lie on my own quarterdeck?
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢在我的甲板上对我撒谎么？

sentences.english: You dare to beard the lion in his den.
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢在太岁头上动土。

sentences.english: Have my Ding male beauty in small letters dare to mouth crazy.
sentences.chinese: 有我丁大美男在，小字竟敢口狂言。

sentences.english: The ravings are gone to where this is emits hair head fellow in having the audacity mouth .
sentences.chinese: 这是哪里冒出来的毛头小子，竟敢口出狂言。

sentences.english: That thy heart could forget, Thy spirit deceive.
sentences.chinese: 悲伤你的心竟然忘却，你的灵魂竟敢欺诳。

sentences.english: Of that sublimest lore which man had dared unlearn?
sentences.chinese: 人们竟敢忘记古训的崇高？

sentences.english: The boy dares to play this trick with me.
sentences.chinese: 真的吗？臭小子竟敢和我玩这招。

sentences.english: How dare you bully a magistrate?

definition: to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)
how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
